title: Recieved Riot Kayle but no icon (riot 10 year rewards)
body: hello,as you all know riot has decided to give us some things for her 10 year celebration and i have recieved only Riot Kayle but not the summoner icon,can someone please tell me if thats a bug or it should happen? Thanks :) {{summoner:31}}

replies.body: I've had the icon but nothing else( i allready own rito kayle)

The gifts are being sent out individually, and will take time to everything finish with all of the eligible accounts.  We'll have updates on our [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-).  Hopefully that helps clear things up!
